prompt: create a table for a restaurant management app that can save all menu, transactions, and employee data. There is 2 kind of user, employee and manager.
I want to create a flight booking application.
Create a model for a bus management application.
Create a model for an online marketplace that connects people who want to rent out their homes with people who are looking for accommodations in specific locales
Create a model for an online travel application that provides a wide range of travel needs on one platform. Offers include flights and hotels.
completion:
table users{
  first_name string
  last_name string
  birth_date date
  gender string
  address string
  city string
  state string
  zip_code string
  profile_picture file [ extensions:".png, .jpg, .svg"]
}
table flights{
  flight_number string [unique:true]
  origin string
  destination string
  departure_date_time datetime
  arrival_date_time datetime
}
table seats {
  flight flights ManyToOne
  seat_number string
  price int
  status string [enums:["booked" "available"]]
  seat_class string [enums:["economy" "premium_economy" "business" "first_class"]]
}
table hotels{
  name string [unique:true]
  address string
  city string
  state string
  zip_code string
  price int
  rooms int
}
table hotel_bookings{
  user users ManyToOne OnDelete:SET NULL
  hotel hotels ManyToOne OnDelete:SET NULL
  start_date date
  end_date date
  status string [enums:["waiting for payment" "paid"]]
}
table flight_bookings{
  user users ManyToOne OnDelete:SET NULL
  seat seats ManyToOne OnDelete:SET NULL
  status string [enums:["waiting for payment" "paid"]]
}
role user{
  select insert update delete [users["external_id == user.id"]]
  select [flights seats hotels]
  select insert update [hotel_bookings["user.external_id == user.id"] flight_bookings["user.external_id == user.id"]]
}
